verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Take me into the throne room
Where I will stand in Your mercy,
Your mercy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Take Where I will proclaim how You love me
You love me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So let me come with confidence and praise
As I stand, boldly in Your grace

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
If home is where the heart is
And my heart it lies in you
Take me home I'm coming home
